exchange.title: Contact
exchange.description: Share your contact information to connect with this profile owner.
exchange.location_share_description: To help visualize where connections are being made, you can share your approximate location. This is optional.
exchange.location_permission_denied: Location access was denied. You can enable it in your browser settings.
exchange.geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
exchange.error_message: Failed to share contact information. Please try again.
exchange.profile_not_found: Profile not found. Please try again.
exchange.validation_error: Please check your information and try again.

contacts.title: Contact List
contacts.subtitle: Manage contacts who have shared their information through your profile
contacts.try_adjusting_filters: Try adjusting your search or filters
contacts.contacts_will_appear_here: Contacts will appear here when visitors share their information through your profile

add_icon_modal.title: Add Icon
add_icon_modal.no_icons_found: No icons found. Try something else?

support.support_banner_description: Show your support for important causes with a profile banner. Only one banner can be active at a time.

social.add_icons_description: Add icons linking to your social profiles, email and more.
social.drag_drop_reorder: Drag and drop the icons above to reorder them.

map.api_key_missing: Google Maps API key is not configured. Please add your API key to enable maps.
map.api_key_invalid: Invalid Google Maps API key. Please check your configuration.
map.quota_exceeded: Google Maps quota exceeded. Please check your billing settings.
map.billing_required: Google Maps billing account required. Please enable billing in Google Cloud Console.
map.generic_error: Unable to load map. Please try again later.
map.no_location_description: Contact locations will appear here when visitors share their location.
map.no_location_data_description: No contacts have shared their location yet. When visitors submit contact forms with location permission granted, their locations will appear on this map.
map.loading_error_description: Please check your Google Maps API key configuration or try refreshing the page.
map.click_marker_tip: Click any marker to focus on that contact's location

appearance.custom_appearance_description: Completely customize your Linktree profile. Change your background with colors, gradients and images. Choose a button style, change the typeface and more.

share.get_more_visitors: Get more visitors to your Linktree by sharing it with your audience.
share.add_linktree_url_description: Add your Linktree URL to your social profiles for the world to easily find your Linktree.
share.share_linktree_connections: Share your Linktree to all your connections so everyone knows about it.
share.qr_code_description: Here is your unique Linktree QR code that will direct people to your Linktree when scanned.
share.snapchat_description: Add your Linktree to your Snapchat Public Profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, open Snapchat, go to My Public Profile, tap Edit, then select Linktree or Website, then Add Your Linktree and paste your Linktree URL into the Add Linktree field.
share.instagram_description: Add your Linktree to your Instagram profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to Edit Profile, and paste it into the Website field.
share.facebook_description: Add your Linktree to your Facebook profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to the About page on your profile, click on Contact and basic info, then click on + Add a website, paste your Linktree URL into the Website address field, and click Save.
share.tiktok_description: Add your Linktree to your TikTok profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your TikTok profile, click on Manage Account, click on Edit profile, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field, then click Save. (Note you may need to switch to a TikTok business account to activate this).
share.twitch_description: Add your Linktree to your Twitch channel. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your Twitch channel, click About, then click Edit about & links settings, scroll down to Social Links, add Linktree in the first text field, and paste your Linktree URL into the second text field, then click Add.
share.facebook_page_description: Add your Linktree to your Facebook page. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to the About page, scroll to Additional Contact Info, click on Enter website, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field.
share.youtube_description: Add your Linktree to your YouTube channel. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to your YouTube channel, click on Customize Channel, then click on Basic info, and under Links, add a link title and paste your Linktree URL into the URL field, then click Publish.
share.linkedin_description: Add your Linktree to your LinkedIn profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your LinkedIn profile, click on pencil icon, scroll down to Contact info, paste your Linktree URL into the Website URL field, then click Apply.
share.pinterest_description: Add your Linktree to your Pinterest profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go your Pinterest settings, paste your Linktree URL into the Website URL field, then click Save.
share.twitter_description: Add your Linktree to your Twitter profile. Simply copy your Linktree URL, go to your profile, click on Edit Profile, and paste your Linktree URL into the Website field.

seo.title: SEO
seo.metadata_notice: Changes to metadata may take some time to appear on other platforms.

welcome.subject: Thanks for creating an account!
welcome.title: Welcome to My Linktree Clone!
welcome.description: This project is my attempt at recreating the amazing system that Linktree has developed.
welcome.disclaimer_text: This is not the actual linktree, and has no affiliation to or with Linktree, it is just a personal project.
welcome.credentials_intro: Your login credentials are provided below:
welcome.footer: Thank you for checking my project out. ❤❤❤

reset.subject: Password Reset Email
reset.title: Password Reset Email
reset.description: You've requested to reset your password. Please use the following link to reset your password:
reset.footer: Thank you for using our service! ❤❤❤
reset.reset_message: You've requested to reset your password for your TapIt account. Click the button below to create a new password. This link will expire in 1 hour for security reasons.
reset.reset_security_message: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email. Your account remains secure and no changes have been made.
reset.additional_info: For your security, this link will expire in 1 hour. If you need assistance, please contact our support team.
reset.reset_footer_message: This email was sent from TapIt
reset.reset_footer_note: If you're having trouble with the button above, copy and paste this URL into your browser:
reset.contact_support: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our support team.

teams.step_2: Share this code with team members to invite them
teams.step_3: Manage your team settings and view analytics

teams.join_existing_subtitle: Have a team code? Join an existing team instead.
teams.manager_feature_desc: Upgrade to a Team Manager plan to create your own team, invite members, and view team-wide analytics.

teams.allow_member_analytics: Allow members to view team analytics
teams.regenerate_code_desc: This will invalidate the current code and all pending invitations.
teams.delete_team_desc: Permanently delete this team and remove all members.
teams.confirm_regenerate_code: Are you sure? This will invalidate the current team code and all pending invitations.
teams.confirm_delete_team: This will permanently delete your team and remove all members. Type

teams.share_code_instead: You can also share the team code

support_groups.banner_link_text: Your banner will link to this

support_creator.caption: Support Creator
support_creator.card_message: Take a look at my projects and the things I've added to GitHub. You'll find a mix of different stuff I've worked on, and I'm excited to share them with you!
support_creator.title: Discover My GitHub Projects
support_creator.message: I invite you to explore my GitHub profile, where you can find an array of exciting projects and contributions. Feel free to take a look, and if you find something you like, don't hesitate to show your support by leaving a star ⭐

free_palestine.caption: #FreePalestine
free_palestine.card_message: Display a support banner to encourage your visitors to #FreePalestine, donate and discover resources, and support the right for people everywhere to live in peace.
free_palestine.title: War is not the answer.
free_palestine.message: I'm driving awareness, donations, and support to #FreePalestine, and the right for people everywhere to live in peace. Will you join me?

stand_with_ukraine.caption: #StandWithUkraine
stand_with_ukraine.card_message: Display a support banner to encourage your visitors to #StandWithUkraine, donate and discover resources, and support the right for people everywhere to live in peace.
stand_with_ukraine.title: War is not the answer.
stand_with_ukraine.message: I'm driving awareness, donations and support to #StandWithUkraine, and the right for people everywhere to live in peace. Will you join me?

anti_racism.caption: Anti-Racism
anti_racism.card_message: Display a support banner on your Linktree allowing your visitors to donate and discover resources in support of anti-racism, justice and equality.
anti_racism.title: Support Anti-Racism
anti_racism.message: I'm raising awareness, driving donations and sharing information in support of racial justice and equality. Will you join me?

pride.caption: Pride
pride.card_message: Display a support banner to raise awareness and funds for the LGBTQIA+ community during Pride month.
pride.title: Protect LGBTQIA+ rights
pride.message: In celebration of Pride, I'm raising awareness and funds to support the LGBTQIA+ community. Join me.

file_manager.file_too_large: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}
file_manager.supported_formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, TXT

info.traffic_sources_description: Traffic sources show you where your visitors are coming from when they visit your profile. This helps you understand which platforms drive the most engagement and optimize your content strategy.
info.social_description: When visitors click your link from social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, or Twitter.
info.social_examples: Examples: Instagram bio, TikTok profile, Twitter posts
info.direct_description: When visitors type your URL directly or use bookmarks. This often indicates strong brand recognition.
info.direct_examples: Examples: Typing tapit.fr/yourname, clicking bookmarks, some mobile apps
info.search_description: When visitors find your profile through Google, Bing, or other search engines.
info.search_examples: Examples: Google search results, Bing, Yahoo search
info.email_description: When visitors click your link from email newsletters, campaigns, or signatures.
info.email_examples: Examples: Email newsletters, signature links, promotional emails
info.utm_description: Special tracking links with UTM parameters that let you track specific campaigns or collaborations.
info.tip_1: Focus your content on platforms that drive the most engagement
info.tip_2: Track the success of collaborations and campaigns with UTM links
info.tip_3: Optimize your bio links on platforms with high conversion rates
info.tip_4: High direct traffic shows strong brand recognition

analytics.no_traffic_data: No traffic source data available yet.
analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.subtitle: Track your profile views and link clicks
analytics.share_to_track: Share your profile to start tracking views and clicks!
